title: Why is OAuth still hard in 2023?

"Problem 2: API Variations"->"Authorize Call Parameters Differ"[label="e.g., audience, prompt"];"Problem 2: API Variations"->"Token Request Variations"[label="Headers vs Body"];"Problem 2: API Variations"->"Dynamic Redirect URLs"[label="e.g., Shopify"];"Problem 2: API Variations"->"Callback URL Restrictions"[label="e.g., localhost HTTPS"];"Problem 3: Nonstandard Extensions"->"Quickbooks: realmID";"Problem 3: Nonstandard Extensions"->"Salesforce: instance_url";"Problem 3: Nonstandard Extensions"->"Slack: user_scopes";"Problem 3: Nonstandard Extensions"->"Additional Parameters in OAuth Flow";"Problem 4: Debugging Challenges"->"Generic Error Messages"[label="e.g., invalid_request"];"Problem 4: Debugging Challenges"->"Incorrect or Outdated Docs";"Problem 4: Debugging Challenges"->"Scope Mismatches";"Problem 4: Debugging Challenges"->"Unclear API Behavior";"Problem 5: Approval Processes"->"Google: Security Reviews";"Problem 5: Approval Processes"->"HubSpot: Marketplace Listings";"Problem 5: Approval Processes"->"Xero: Revenue Sharing";"Problem 6: Security and Moving Target"->"Expiring Access Tokens";"Problem 6: Security and Moving Target"->"Refresh Token Behavior";"Problem 6: Security and Moving Target"->"Race Conditions in Token Refresh";"Subset Implementations by APIs"->"API-Specific OAuth Docs"[label="Long and Detailed"];"Additional Parameters in OAuth Flow"->"Quirky API-Specific Implementations"[label="e.g., Jira"];subgraph cluster_2{label="Proposed Solution";style=filled;color=lightgreen;"Nango: Prebuilt OAuth Flows"->"Prebuilt for 170+ APIs";"Nango: Prebuilt OAuth Flows"->"Secure Token Storage";"Nango: Prebuilt OAuth Flows"->"Automatic Token Refreshes";}"Complexity in Real-World Implementations"->"Nango: Prebuilt OAuth Flows"[label="A Better Way?"];}
